channel.title: CVE Feed for UkrSolution -- Barcode Scanner with Inventory & Order Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for UkrSolution -- Barcode Scanner with Inventory & Order Manager

item.title: CVE-2024-34557|2024-06-12T19:17:12.699Z -- ukrsolution -- barcode%20scanner%20with%20inventory%20%26%20order%20manager
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in UkrSolution Barcode Scanner with Inventory & Order Manager.This issue affects Barcode Scanner with Inventory & Order Manager: from n/a through 1.5.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-34556|2024-06-06T18:56:33.234Z -- ukrsolution -- barcode%20scanner%20with%20inventory%20%26%20order%20manager
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in UkrSolution Barcode Scanner with Inventory & Order Manager.This issue affects Barcode Scanner with Inventory & Order Manager: from n/a through 1.5.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-34557|2024-05-09T11:40:40.149Z -- ukrsolution -- barcode%20scanner%20with%20inventory%20%26%20order%20manager
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in UkrSolution Barcode Scanner with Inventory & Order Manager.This issue affects Barcode Scanner with Inventory & Order Manager: from n/a through 1.5.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-33565|2024-06-10T12:30:10.593Z -- ukrsolution -- barcode%20scanner%20with%20inventory%20%26%20order%20manager
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in UkrSolution Barcode Scanner with Inventory & Order Manager.This issue affects Barcode Scanner with Inventory & Order Manager: from n/a through 1.5.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-33567|2024-06-04T17:44:57.193Z -- ukrsolution -- barcode%20scanner%20with%20inventory%20%26%20order%20manager
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in UkrSolution Barcode Scanner with Inventory & Order Manager allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects Barcode Scanner with Inventory & Order Manager: from n/a through 1.5.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-27998|2024-06-04T17:46:38.484Z -- ukrsolution -- barcode%20scanner%20with%20inventory%20%26%20order%20manager
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in UkrSolution Barcode Scanner with Inventory & Order Manager allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Barcode Scanner with Inventory & Order Manager: from n/a through 1.5.3.
